title: Glary Utilities Pro 5.45.0.65 Final + Lifetime Serial
description:
Glary Utilities Pro is a software that provides you with the necessary tools for cleaning and maintaing your computer system. 



The interface of the program consists of a small and simple to use windows. Novices shouldn't have any ploblems in getting around the tool.



So you can scan for issues revolving incorrect registry entries, invalid shortcuts, dangerous startup entries, temporary files, history asnd internet traces, spyware and adware.



But you can also remove junk files in order to free up space, clean up de Windopws rtegistry items, fix errors found in the start menu and desktop, as well as uninstall programs from your computer.



Plus, you can erase the history, cookies and traces from your web browsers. Use a shredder by The Gutmann method (35-pass overwrite technique) to permanently delete files beyond recovery, encrypt and decrypt files, analize disk space usage, locate and delete duplicate files, remove empty folders, join and split files and more.



In addition, you can schedule a task, select the tracks you want to erase, set Glary Utilities Pro to automatically run at system startup, change the interface language, minimize to system tray, erase privacy tracks on Windows logoff or shutdown and others.



The tool takes up a low-to-moderate amoubnt of system resources, includes a comprehensive help file and work smoothly during my tests. I haven't come across any issues and strongly recommend Glary Utilities Pro to all users.



Changelog (22 February 2016):

- Optimized Disk Cleaner: added 'VSO Blu-ray 
- Converter Ultimate' and 'VSO DVD Converter 
- Ultimate' Optimized Tracks Eraser: added 'Foxit Reader' and 'Stardock WindowBlinds' 
- Minor GUI improvements 
- Minor bug fixes
